name: Jesse Pollak
description: Jesse Pollak is the Creator of Base. Prior to creating Base, Jesse led all of Coinbaseâ€™s consumer-facing engineering from early 2017 to middle 2021, including building Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, and Coinbase Wallet.
